void cmd_verifyKeyPIN ( void   ) 

Verify Key/Verify PIN.

This function is a combined implementation of Verify Key and Verify PIN. This is done to save code size.

References ADM_KEY_LEN, auth_verifyPin(), INS_VERIFY_KEY, PIN_LEN, SW_OK, sw_set(), t0_recBlock(), t0_sendAck(), t0_testP1P2(), and t0_testP3().

Referenced by main().

Variable Documentation

iu8 resplen

Valid data in response array. Invalid if zero.

Referenced by cmd_getResponse(), cmd_intAuth(), cmd_select(), and main().

iu8 response[8]

Data returned by Get Response command.

The size of this array is the max. of sizeof(S_FINFO) and CRYPT_BLOCK_LEN.

Referenced by cmd_getResponse(), cmd_intAuth(), and cmd_select().
